entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is a newspaper that Harry reads. It is mentioned as lying on the bed and having a headline about Dumbledore.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who is not mentioned in the current issue of the Daily Prophet, but Harry suspects that the Ministry is suppressing news about him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who has a story coming out next week in the Daily Prophet. He is described as looking harried.

relationships.description: The Ministry is leaning on the Daily Prophet to suppress news about Voldemort, according to Harry's suspicions.
Dumbledore has a story coming out next week in the Daily Prophet.
